title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: The JarExporter is causing an out of sync message when overwriting an exported jar file in the same directory as the project.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when attempting to overwrite the jar file for the second time.
EB: The out of sync message should not appear when overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory as the project.
SR:
1. Open a project directory.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Verify that an out of sync message is displayed.
